text: David Alan "Ted" Turner (born 2 August 1950) is an English guitarist and singer. He was one of Wishbone Ash's lead guitarists between 1969 and 1974; and again between 1987 and 1994.Hill, Gary. [ Ted Turner] at Allmusic Cromelin, Richard. Argus album review, Rolling Stone, 17 August 1972 ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:English guitarists Category:Musicians from Birmingham Category:English singer- songwriters
title: Ted Turner (guitarist)
